byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

abstract: White House official confirms Secret Service agent shot and wounded man who approached White House with gun.
lead_paragraph: The White House and Treasury were on lockdown as the police investigated the shooting of a man, who was wounded by a Secret Service officer.

headline.main: Secret Service Shoots Man Near White House
headline.print_headline: Secret Service Shoots Man With Gun Near White House

snippet: The White House and Treasury were on lockdown as the police investigated the shooting of a man, who was wounded by a Secret Service officer.
